FuncDef: The display dhcp option82 configuration command displays the DHCP Option 82 configuration. The display dhcp option82 configuration command displays the DHCP Option 82 configuration.
CLIs: display dhcp option82 configuration [ vlan <vlan-id> | interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the DHCP Option 82 configuration in a specified VLAN.
For the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ:The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
For the CE6885-LL (low latency mode):The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1023.

Displays the DHCP Option 82 configuration on a specified interface.
-

interface-name specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the VLAN ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 16777215.
